citations.narrative:
There was no record of minutes for the IACUC meeting held on 08/15/2023 available for review at the time of inspection.
Maintaining meeting minutes is important to document IACUC activities, reviews, discussions, and deliberations and helps
demonstrate the functionality of the IACUC. Each research facility must maintain IACUC records of meeting minutes,
including records of attendance, activities of the Committee, and Committee deliberations.
Correct from this date 01/18/2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.35(a)(1) 
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
There was no record of minutes for the IACUC meeting held on 08/15/2023 available for review at the time of inspection. 
Maintaining meeting minutes is important to document IACUC activities, reviews, discussions, and deliberations and helps 
demonstrate the functionality of the IACUC. Each research facility must maintain IACUC records of meeting minutes, 
including records of attendance, activities of the Committee, and Committee deliberations. 
 
Correct from this date 01/18/2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
